comments.author: HedgeFx
comments.body: As I wrote, can’t use my OKEx account because is under Kyc review (my driving license is expired ) and I’m on holiday since August 1st so can’t provide new ID and POF address until I return home.Used address is my BYBIT account .Will quote used address future reference , thanks.Quote from: Timelord2067 on August 19, 2023, 06:03:22 AMQuote from: HedgeFx on August 14, 2023, 07:10:05 AMTRC20 - USDT address: TAWMrGapnfBt6pbfkExBHuSB9bDMunnaeoWhat's with the new wallet address?
